name: Command:Break
description:
(Download "command break.zip" working version)

Controls:
arrows keys - For moving forward backward and rotating
P for pause

Description:
The Microsoft azure lux competition gave developers 3 days to build a game, based around the theme "chain reaction". I decided to make a game based a round little robot that is forced to complete dangerous test rooms, until they reach breaking point. So the robot gets more angry because of the chain of events causing him to break and attack his master. unfortunately wasn't able to finish the game in time to the standard i wanted to but will continue to work on it. As a novice to game development, learned alot. Thank god for you tube tutorials
